name: Probiotic Plus
shortDescription: A high-potency probiotic blend to support a healthy gut microbiome and boost immune function.
descriptionHtml: Our Probiotic Plus formula contains 50 billion CFUs from 10 clinically-researched strains to promote optimal digestive health and regularity. It helps reduce bloating and gas while strengthening your body's natural defenses.
directions: Take one capsule daily with a meal.
warnings: Consult your healthcare provider before use if you are pregnant, nursing, or taking any medication.

name: Testo Boost Max
shortDescription: A natural testosterone support supplement for enhanced vitality, strength, and performance.
descriptionHtml: Testo Boost Max combines powerful, clinically-studied ingredients like D-Aspartic Acid, Fenugreek, and Zinc to help support healthy testosterone levels. Ideal for men looking to increase energy, improve workout performance, and build lean muscle mass.
directions: Take three capsules daily, preferably with a meal.
warnings: For adult men only. Do not use if you have a serious medical condition.

name: Glow Collagen Peptides
shortDescription: Hydrolyzed collagen peptides for radiant skin, stronger hair, and healthier nails.
descriptionHtml: Restore your natural radiance from within. Glow Collagen Peptides provides hydrolyzed type I & III collagen to support skin elasticity, reduce fine lines, and promote healthy hair and nail growth. Unflavored and easily dissolvable in any beverage.
directions: Mix one scoop into your favorite beverage daily.
warnings: Store in a cool, dry place.

name: Keto Burn Elite
shortDescription: Advanced ketogenic weight loss support with BHB salts to accelerate ketosis and burn fat for fuel.
descriptionHtml: Achieve your weight loss goals faster with Keto Burn Elite. This formula provides exogenous ketones (BHB) to help your body enter and maintain a state of ketosis, where it uses fat for energy instead of carbs. Experience increased mental clarity, sustained energy, and enhanced fat burning.
directions: Take two capsules daily with 8oz of water.
warnings: Use in conjunction with a ketogenic diet for best results.
cons: Can cause mild stomach upset initially

name: Dental ProGuard
shortDescription: A chewable dental probiotic that supports healthy gums, fresh breath, and a balanced oral microbiome.
descriptionHtml: Dental ProGuard is an advanced oral health formula with a proprietary blend of 3.5 billion probiotic strains. These beneficial bacteria work to crowd out bad bacteria, supporting healthy gums, teeth, and long-lasting fresh breath.

ingredients.name: Proprietary Probiotic Blend
ingredients.note: L. Reuteri, L. Paracasei, B. Lactis

directions: Slowly chew one tablet daily after brushing.
pros: Targets root cause of gum issues

name: Turmeric Supreme
shortDescription: High-absorption turmeric curcumin extract for powerful anti-inflammatory and antioxidant support.
descriptionHtml: Support a healthy response to inflammation with Turmeric Supreme. Our formula features a potent turmeric extract standardized to 95% curcuminoids and includes black pepper extract (BioPerine®) for enhanced absorption and bioavailability.
directions: Take two capsules daily with a meal.
warnings: Consult a physician if you have a medical condition or are taking blood thinners.
